name: Egg Drop Soup (Emeril)
ingredients: 4 shiitake mushrooms, stems removed, wiped clean and thinly sliced
instructions: Add green onions, spinach, mushrooms, soy and pepper.
Return to a bare simmer and cook 3 minutes.
Gradually add eggs in a slow steady stream.
Cook until eggs are set, stirring to create shreds or ribbons of eggs, 1 minute.
Serve with garnish of green onions.
